sources.title: Lust for Gold (1949)
sources.description: A man determined to track down the fabled Arizona gold mine known as The Lost Dutchman has an affair with a married treasure hunter, whose pursuit of the mine has lead her to double-cross her husband. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lust-for-gold-1949/

metadata.Plot: The tale of how immigrant Jacob Walz, the "Dutchman" (German) of Arizona's notorious Lost Dutchman gold mine, found treasure and love and lost them again.
metadata.Writer: Ted Sherdeman, Richard English, Barry Storm
metadata.Actors: Ida Lupino, Glenn Ford, Gig Young
